title: Fixes #97: Implement CSS-only tabbed interface for teams
body: Fixes #97 > C:\Code\temp-swarm\logs\passthroughs\passthrough1272-response.txt 2>&1

title: Create comprehensive feature test page
body:
Build integration testing showcase.

**Requirements:**
- Create test.html with sections demonstrating ALL features
- Checklist: ‚úÖ Navigation; Animations; Search; Filters; Gallery; Lightbox; Modals; Forms; Notifications; Tabs; Tooltips; Parallax; Theme; Accessibility; Tetris
- Test responsive breakpoints: toggle device toolbar
- Cross-browser test notes: Chrome; Firefox; Safari; Edge
- Performance metrics display
- Known issues section
- Link to this page in footer (hidden; only accessible via direct URL)

**Depends on:** #38 (all JS features complete)

title: Implement WebGL particle background effect
body:
Create immersive background.

**Requirements:**
- Use Three.js library for WebGL
- Particle system: 1000+ particles forming Avengers 'A' logo
- Mouse interaction: particles move away from cursor
- Vertex and fragment shaders for glow effect
- Optimize: reduce particles on mobile (check window.innerWidth); use geometry instancing
- FPS counter in debug mode
- Fallback: static gradient background on low-performance devices (check navigator.hardwareConcurrency)

**Depends on:** #38 (JS); #29 (background layers)

title: Add Web Animations API for complex effects
body:
Replace CSS transitions with JS animations.

**Requirements:**
- Animate hero cards on scroll: card.animate([{transform; opacity}; {transform; opacity}]; {duration: 600; easing: 'ease-out'})
- Create reusable animation functions: fadeIn(); slideIn(); scaleUp()
- Chaining: animation.finished.then(() => nextAnimation())
- Playback controls: animation.play(); pause(); reverse()
- Animation presets for different effects
- Fallback to CSS for unsupported browsers

**Depends on:** #38 (JS); #8 (cards)

title: Build service worker for offline PWA support
body:
Enable offline functionality.

**Requirements:**
- Create /service-worker.js
- Cache critical assets on install: HTML; CSS; JS; fonts; key images
- Fetch strategy: network-first for API; cache-first for assets
- Offline page fallback when network unavailable
- Register in main.js: navigator.serviceWorker.register() with feature detection
- Update notification when new SW available: show toast 'Update available' with refresh button

**Depends on:** #38 (JS for registration)

title: Create performance monitoring dashboard
body:
Track site performance metrics.

**Requirements:**
- Use Performance API: window.performance.timing
- Measure: page load time; time to interactive; largest contentful paint (LCP); first input delay (FID)
- PerformanceObserver for ongoing monitoring
- Log to console in dev mode (check query param ?debug=true)
- Performance budget warnings if thresholds exceeded (LCP > 2.5s)
- Simple dashboard overlay showing metrics (toggle with Ctrl+Shift+P)

**Depends on:** #38 (JS foundation)

title: Add comprehensive accessibility improvements

labels.name: wip
labels.description: Work in progress - claimed by agent

body:
Ensure WCAG AA compliance.

**Requirements:**
- ARIA labels: aria-label on icon buttons; aria-labelledby on sections
- Role attributes: role='navigation'; role='main'; role='complementary'
- aria-expanded on expandable elements (accordion; dropdown)
- aria-live='polite' for dynamic content (search results; notifications)
- Keyboard navigation: visible focus styles (:focus-visible); logical tab order (tabindex)
- Skip-to-content link
- Color contrast: check all text meets 4.5:1 ratio
- Test with screen reader

**Depends on:** #38 (JS for dynamic ARIA)

title: Implement theme switcher with localStorage

labels.name: wip
labels.description: Work in progress - claimed by agent

body:
Add light/dark mode toggle.

**Requirements:**
- Toggle button in header (sun ‚òÄÔ∏è / moon üåô icon; swaps based on state)
- Click toggles 'dark-theme' class on <body>
- Update CSS variables for dark theme: lighter backgrounds; darker text; adjusted accent colors for contrast
- Save preference: localStorage.setItem('theme'; 'dark')
- Load on page load: check localStorage; apply class
- Smooth transition: transition: background-color 0.3s; color 0.3s

**Depends on:** #38 (JS); #3 (CSS variables)

title: Create advanced search with multi-filter system

labels.name: wip
labels.description: Work in progress - claimed by agent

body:
Enhance search with comprehensive filters.

**Requirements:**
- Filter controls: Team (Alpha/Beta/Gamma checkboxes); Power Type (Tech/Enhanced/Cosmic/Mystic); Threat Level (1-5 range); Status (Active/Reserve/Retired)
- Combine search text + all active filters with AND logic
- Update results in real-time (debounced)
- 'Clear All Filters' button resets
- Show result count: 'Showing 8 of 24 Avengers'
- Animate filtered items: fade out removed; fade in added

**Depends on:** #38 (JS); #46 (basic search)

title: Implement Tetris hold piece and preview features
body:
Add advanced gameplay mechanics.

**Requirements:**
- Hold piece: C key swaps current piece with held piece
- Restriction: can't hold twice consecutively (flag: canHold)
- Draw held piece in UI panel (small canvas 80√ó80px)
- Next piece preview already in #54; ensure it updates on piece spawn
- Visual feedback when hold is used (brief highlight)
- Reset canHold when piece locks

**Depends on:** #54 (UI panels)

title: Add Tetris UI panels and game over screen
body:
Create game interface and displays.

**Requirements:**
- UI panel next to canvas: current score; level; lines cleared; next piece preview; high score; controls help
- Next piece: small canvas (80√ó80px) showing upcoming tetromino
- High score from localStorage
- Live updates as game progresses
- Game Over overlay: semi-transparent background; 'GAME OVER' text; final score; 'Play Again' button
- Avengers theme styling

**Depends on:** #50 (canvas setup)

title: Implement Tetris line clearing and scoring
body:
Add win conditions and progression.

**Requirements:**
- Detect full rows: check if all 10 cells in row are filled
- Line clear animation: flash row (change color briefly)
- Remove cleared rows; shift remaining blocks down
- Scoring: 1 line=100pts; 2 lines=300; 3 lines=500; 4 lines=800 (Tetris bonus)
- Level up every 10 lines cleared
- Speed increase: gravity interval = max(100; 1000 - (level * 50))
- Update score display

**Depends on:** #52 (game loop)

title: Create Tetris game canvas and grid setup

labels.name: wip
labels.description: Work in progress - claimed by agent

body:
Build dedicated Tetris game page.

**Requirements:**
- Create tetris.html with <canvas id='game' width='320' height='640'>
- Create /js/tetris.js module
- Get 2D context: canvas.getContext('2d')
- Game grid: 10 columns √ó 20 rows (32px cells)
- Define tetromino shapes (I; O; T; S; Z; J; L) as 2D arrays with rotation states
- Color scheme from Avengers theme
- Draw grid borders and background
- Link from main nav

**Depends on:** #38 (JS foundation)

title: Implement form validation with real-time feedback
body:
Create 'Join Initiative' contact form.

**Requirements:**
- Form fields: name (required); email (required; pattern); abilities (textarea; min 50 chars); clearance level (select)
- Blur event validation per field
- Check: required; email format; min/max length
- Show error messages below fields with CSS class toggle
- Prevent submit if errors exist
- Success message on valid submit
- Reset form after success

**Depends on:** #38 (JS setup)

title: Build tab switching with keyboard navigation
body:
Enhance tabbed interface with JS.

**Requirements:**
- Click event on tab buttons updates active state
- Show/hide content panels with fade transition (opacity)
- Keyboard support: Arrow keys navigate tabs; Enter/Space activates
- Store active tab in sessionStorage for persistence
- URL hash for deep linking (e.g.; #team-alpha)
- ARIA: aria-selected; role='tab'; role='tabpanel'

**Depends on:** #38 (JS); #24 (tabs HTML)

title: Create dynamic search filtering functionality

labels.name: wip
labels.description: Work in progress - claimed by agent

body:
Implement real-time search.

**Requirements:**
- Input event on search field (debounced 300ms)
- Filter roster cards by name; codename; abilities (case-insensitive)
- Show/hide matches: element.style.display = 'none' or remove from DOM
- Highlight matching text with <mark> tags
- Show 'No results found' message when empty
- Clear button resets search
- Update URL query parameter

**Depends on:** #38 (JS); #26 (search bar)

title: Add parallax scrolling effect on layers
body:
Create depth with parallax.

**Requirements:**
- Scroll event listener (throttled to 16ms for 60fps)
- Calculate scroll position: window.pageYOffset
- Apply different speeds to layers: back (0.1x); mid (0.3x); front (0.5x)
- transform: translateY(scrollPos * speed)
- Use requestAnimationFrame for smooth updates
- Disable on mobile (performance; will-change CSS)

**Depends on:** #38 (JS); #29 (parallax layers)

title: Implement statistics counter animation with easing
body:
Animate numbers counting up.

**Requirements:**
- Trigger when stats section scrolls into view (IntersectionObserver)
- Animate from 0 to target value over 2000ms
- Use requestAnimationFrame for smooth counting
- Easing function: easeOutQuart for natural deceleration
- Format large numbers with commas: toLocaleString()
- Store final values in data attributes

**Depends on:** #38 (JS); #10 (stats HTML)

title: Create lazy loading with Intersection Observer
body:
Optimize image loading performance.

**Requirements:**
- Add data-src attribute to images; src='placeholder-lqip.jpg'
- IntersectionObserver with threshold: 0.1; rootMargin: '50px'
- On intersect: img.src = img.dataset.src; img.classList.add('loaded')
- CSS fade-in on .loaded class
- Fallback for old browsers: immediate load
- Disconnect observer after load

**Depends on:** #38 (JS); #13 (images)

title: Build hamburger menu toggle with animation

labels.name: wip
labels.description: Work in progress - claimed by agent

body:
Implement mobile navigation.

**Requirements:**
- Click event on hamburger button toggles .active class
- Hamburger animation: 3 bars ‚Üí X (transform: rotate and translate)
- Menu slides in: transform: translateX(100%) ‚Üí translateX(0); transition: 0.3s ease
- Close on outside click (document event listener; stopPropagation)
- Prevent body scroll when menu open: body.style.overflow = 'hidden'
- ARIA: aria-expanded toggle

**Depends on:** #38 (JS); #6 (nav HTML)

title: Implement smooth scroll with offset for sticky header

labels.name: wip
labels.description: Work in progress - claimed by agent

body:
Add smooth scrolling for navigation.

**Requirements:**
- Prevent default anchor click
- Calculate target position: element.offsetTop - headerHeight
- window.scrollTo({ top; behavior: 'smooth' })
- Update URL hash without jumping: history.pushState
- Active link highlighting based on scroll position (IntersectionObserver)
- Debounce scroll events

**Depends on:** #38 (JS setup)

title: Add basic JavaScript module setup and utilities

title: Create CSS-only tooltip system with arrows

- Show on hover: opacity: 0 ‚Üí 1; transform: translateY(5px) ‚Üí translateY(0)

- Positioning variants: top; bottom; left; right

title: Add CSS classes for scroll-triggered animations
body:
Prepare animation system (JS triggers later).

**Requirements:**
- Classes: .fade-in; .slide-left; .slide-right; .zoom-in; .rotate-in
- Initial state: opacity: 0; transform: translateY(30px) for fade-in
- Active state (.active class): opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0)
- Transitions: all 0.6s cubic-bezier(0.4; 0; 0.2; 1)
- Stagger delays using nth-child for sequential reveals

**Depends on:** #2 (HTML elements)
